quote: One of the most important factors  not only in military matters but in life as a whole  is ... the ability to direct one's whole energies towards the fulfillment of a particular task.
quote_letters: ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT FACTORS  NOT ONLY IN MILITARY MATTERS BUT IN LIFE AS A WHOLE  IS  THE ABILITY TO DIRECT ONES WHOLE ENERGIES TOWARDS THE FULFILLMENT OF A PARTICULAR TASK
